name: Guard Third Base
description:
The objective is to guard the 3 bases from enemy ambush for as long as possible.
Death does not mean the end, it is simply a temporary set back.  Defeat is only accepted when all bases have been destroyed.
Controls are displayed in game.

This game was created in a month by myself and 2 others for a class. I just know decided to upload it for others to experience if they so choose.
